name: FEWDUST
description:
AT A MINIMUM, THE INITIAL SECTOR MUST BE COMPLETED IN ORDER FOR YOUR SCORE TO BE RECORDED ON THE LEADERBOARD.

Your score is accumulated after successfully completing a sector.

Controls

The controls for the game are simple and intuitive. Players must use the on-screen joystick (touchscreen) or keyboard to navigate through the game environment.

Objectives

The objective of the game is to collect resources by approaching asteroids, which will be mined automatically. However, players must also evade and eliminate drones in order to progress through the game. As players advance through the sectors, the required amount of resources and destroyed drones will increase in difficulty. The player must collect a certain amount of resources and eliminate a certain number of drones in order to jump to the next sector.
